name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Salesforce Engineer with 13+ years of full stack development experience, adept in **Salesforce**, **Sales Cloud**, and **Flow Builder**. Proven track record in managing complex CRM solutions with tools like **HubSpot**, **Outreach**, and **Gong**, ensuring seamless lead-to-revenue processes. Demonstrated expertise in **Lightning App Builder** and **Data Loader**, facilitating efficient project management and team collaboration.

Recognized for exceptional communication skills and keen attention to detail, enhancing stakeholder engagement and project outcomes. Strong background in software engineering using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in cloud deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, and skilled in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Proven ability in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation, aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
